initial_question.title: Build error no such file or directory markdown-language-features/preview-src/src
initial_question.body:
After preparing everything by following the instructions in CONTRIBUTING.md, running `npm run watch` return this error:
```
[watch-extensions] [20:45:55] 'watch-extensions' errored after 949 ms
[watch-extensions] [20:45:55] Error: ENOENT: no such file or directory, scandir '/home/x/void/extensions/markdown-language-features/preview-src/src'
ERROR: "watch-extensions" exited with 1.
```

satisfaction_conditions: Project setup follows the correct operating system conventions
